1.11.2.1.3.0:
Several bug fixes and improvements to various things
Added worldinfo_onetime
Added some new commands
1.11.2.1.2.0:
Added the option SkyRenderType to change sky rendering between Overworld or End sky type
Rewrote the teleport command code, again...
1.11.2.1.1.0:
Added day and night cycle length customization
Added sky/cloud/fog color customization and cloud height customization
Added a "ForceGamemode" option for dimensions and a GamemodeTracker to automatically change players' gamemode when they enter/leave dimensions

1.11.1.0.0: Countless fixes, improvements and additions. See the changelog on the CurseForge files page.
1.11.1.0.0-beta.1: Major improvements: new commands, re-written teleport command (now supports all entities and entity selectors), per-dimension gamerules/time/weather/WorldBorder/WorldType
